[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@fgv/ts-utils](./ts-utils.md) &gt; [propagateWithDetail](./ts-utils.propagatewithdetail.md)

## propagateWithDetail() function

Propagates a [Success](./ts-utils.success.md) or [Failure](./ts-utils.failure.md) [Result](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->, adding supplied event details as appropriate.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function propagateWithDetail<T, TD>(result: Result<T>, detail: TD, successDetail?: TD): DetailedResult<T, TD>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  result | [Result](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The [Result](./ts-utils.result.md) to be propagated. |
|  detail | TD | The event detail (type <code>&lt;TD&gt;</code>) to be added to the [result](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->. |
|  successDetail | TD | An optional distinct event detail to be added to [Success](./ts-utils.success.md) results. If <code>successDetail</code> is omitted or <code>undefined</code>, then <code>detail</code> will be applied to [Success](./ts-utils.success.md) results. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[DetailedResult](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, TD&gt;

A new [DetailedResult&lt;T, TD&gt;](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md) with the success value or error message from the original `result` but with the specified detail added.
